name: H0-P3 Project
description:
Humanity's mistreatment of earth has reached it's limit. We need to find another planet urgently.  

Before we launch ourselves into space let's test drive some prototype rockets in a simulation room first. But don't touch anything . We don't have  the budget for durable materials.

Instructions

Fly the rocket trough the obstacles until you find the green landing pad.

Controls

A , D -  Rotate the rocket

Space - Thrust the Rocket

This is an educational project made by a student of GameDevTV's - Complete 3D  Unity Course. 

Obs: Nothing was developed after the 4th level so I forced a loop in it.
